page.title: 03CHURCHES
page.content: There are two churches in our area one is St Michael's Parish Church of Warfield and the other is All Saints Church of England, in Binfield. St Michael Archangel has 3 services held at the Church and another held at the mobile home estate. The vicar of the church is Dr Brian H.Meardon. All Saints have three services two in the morning and one in the evening. The vicar's name is Mr. Blatchley. At St Michaels roughly 200 people come and at All Saints about 120 people come each Sunday. The majority of the people who come are local, others come from Wokingham. The most popular service is the 10.30 family/communion service and the majority of people who attend church are confirmed.
